alerts.description: Could Not Reproduce/Need more info notification
Send Notification to Finance when "Create Org" case is closed
Email First Level Support about PKB case
New Case Comment Email Alert to Customer
New Case Created Alert to Customer
Notify CSM and Sales Executive of new case
Notify Ops of US Gov't Case
Slack notification of a new case

fieldUpdates.description: Updates "Open Days" field to calculate days that a case is open excluding on hold statuses
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Status,"On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"PKI Hold"), IsClosed ), IF(ISNULL(Open_Days__c),0,Open_Days__c), (NOW() - LastModifiedDate )+ IF(ISNULL(Open_Days__c),0,Open_Days__c) )
fieldUpdates.name: Case: update open days field
Change Owner to First Level Support
Convert User Story Ticket to URL
Copy HW Issue to Previous HW Issue
Copy Jira Priority to Previous Jira Prio

fieldUpdates.description: Save previous value for email notifications
fieldUpdates.name: Copy Jira Status to Previous Jira Status

fieldUpdates.description: Store previous owner for email notifications
fieldUpdates.name: Copy Owner to Previous Owner Text

fieldUpdates.description: Storing the previous value of Status so we can use it when sending notification emails to CSMs, etc.
fieldUpdates.name: Copy Status to Previous Status

fieldUpdates.description: Previous value used for email notifications
fieldUpdates.name: Copy Subject to Previous Subject
Copy User Story to Previous User Story
Set CaseOwner queue First Level Support
Set Case Reason Internal IT Issue
Set Case Reason Works As Intended

fieldUpdates.description: Set Case Reason to Enhancement Request based on Case Type equal to Feature Request
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Reason to Enhancement Request

fieldUpdates.description: Set Case Type to Feature Request when a Suggestion is submitted.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Type to Feature Request

fieldUpdates.description: Set High Priority Timestamp to Now
fieldUpdates.name: Set High Priority Timestamp
Set Organization Name from Account Name

fieldUpdates.description: Send Feature Requests to the Product Team
fieldUpdates.name: Set Owner Product Portfolio
User Story Status set to Icebox

rules.description: COPY - When someone pulls a case off of the First Level Support Queue, do these things.
When someone pulls a case off of the First Level Support Queue, do these things.

rules.fullName: Case Created%3A Store Initial Previous Values
rules.description: Store copy of initial values for Status, Subject, Jira_Status, Jira_Priority, User_Story_Ticket, Hardware Issue, Priority into the "Previous" fields. These are used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Case Updated - Update Last Status Change
rules.description: Set a local Last Modified Date field every time a case is updated
rules.formula: OR(ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(Origin), ISCHANGED(Priority), ISCHANGED(Subject), ISCHANGED(Type), ISCHANGED(Hardware_Issue__c), ISCHANGED(Hardware_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Reason), ISCHANGED(Platform__c), ISCHANGED(Description), ISCHANGED(AccountId), ISCHANGED(ContactId) )

rules.fullName: Case assigned to Hardware Action Queue
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OwnerId = "00GE0000001boqk", OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Working"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Escalated"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"New"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Observe"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"On Hold") ) )

rules.description: Email the manager (Marcel) when a case owner changes
Send email to previous owner when case owner changes.
When a case is assigned to a queue
Updates "Open Days" field with field update formula.
Send notification to Finance & Accounting when "Create New Org for Account:" case is closed.

rules.fullName: Comm Status Update%2C notify Account Team
rules.description: Account Team wants to know when customer case communciation happens. When Comm Status is updated to 'Awaiting User Response' or 'User Response Received", send notification to Account Team

rules.fullName: Community Case created assigned to FLS
rules.description: Make sure cases created via the community are assigned to First Level Support.
Make sure cases created by guest and logged in users in the community are assigned to T1
rules.formula: AND( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Community Guest"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Community User")), (Owner:Queue.QueueName <> "Tier 1"))

rules.fullName: Copy Hardware Issue Change to Previous Hardware Issue
rules.description: Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Copy Jira Status Change to Previous Jira Status
rules.description: Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.
Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Copy Priority Change to Previous Priority
rules.description: Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Copy Status Change to Previous Status
rules.description: Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Copy Subject Change to Previous Subject
rules.description: Storing a copy of the previous value. Used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.

rules.fullName: Email Ops for US Fed Gov%27t Cases

rules.description: Should have Priority High

rules.fullName: Feature request case reassigned to product portfolio
rules.description: What to do when a case is reassigned to the product portfolio queue
Set Date/Time on High Priority Timestamp
make Jira Ticket (aka User Story Ticket) look like a URL
Setting fields based on Type=Kudos
Forward to Ariel (API Support)

rules.fullName: New Case Comment Alert to Customer

rules.description: When a case is created, email customer, forward notification to Slack, and set CommStatus

rules.fullName: New Feature Request Case from email
rules.description: What to do when email is sent to support@bluescape.com with subject starting with 'feature request'
When a case is assigned to an account, notify the appropriate AE and CSM
When a case is created and assigned to a non-bluescape account, notify the Account Team

rules.fullName: Notify Account Team if case status changes
rules.description: Notify Account Team if certain case fields change (eg - Status, Subject, JIRA_Status, JIRA_Priority, Priority
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(Subject), ISCHANGED(JIRA_Status__c), ISCHANGED(JiraPriority__c), ISCHANGED(User_Story_Ticket__c), ISCHANGED(Hardware_Issue__c), ISCHANGED(Priority) )

rules.fullName: Notify Case Owner when more info requested

rules.description: Normal Case Assignment Rules don't work for cases created via PKB2. This rule makes sure the Support team is notified and the case is assigned to their queue.

rules.fullName: Priority High-%3EMed changes Status to working
rules.description: Changing high to medium changes status escalated to working
Set Status to Escalated and Case Type to Problem when a Production Issue is reported
When the QA Assistance request box is checked, send email to the QA team
Key on subject "Create New Org for Account: <company name>"

rules.fullName: Service Down cases set Priority High

rules.description: For Feature Requests, set several default values (eg - status, user story status, etc)
rules.formula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Type), "Feature Request")) && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Feature Request") && IsClosed = False

rules.fullName: Set Organization Name from Account Name
rules.description: Organization Name is passed on to Jira when a user creates a jira ticket from within salesforces

rules.fullName: Set Product Manager for Service Dev
rules.description: Based on the platform, set the Product Manager field. This will be passed to Jira when the Create Jira Story button is used.

rules.fullName: Set Product Manager for Wall Dev
rules.description: Based on the platform, set the Product Manager field. This will be passed to Jira when the Create Jira Story button is used.
Store copy of the previous values for Status, Subject, Jira_Status, Jira_Priority, User_Story_Ticket, Hardware Issue, Priority. These are used in email notifications to CSMs, etc.
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(Subject), ISCHANGED(JIRA_Status__c), ISCHANGED(JiraPriority__c), ISCHANGED(Hardware_Issue__c), ISCHANGED(User_Story_Ticket__c), ISCHANGED(Priority) )

rules.description: When User Story Ticket is set, change User Story Status to Icebox

rules.fullName: When User Story Status is Current Dev%2E
rules.description: When User Story Status (from Pivotal) is updated to Current Dev., Update case status

rules.fullName: When User Story Status is Engr Done or Released
rules.description: When User Story Status (from Pivotal) is updated to Engr. Done or Released Update case status to Closed
Set Priority and Reason
